mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, EMAIL, PW, PHONENO, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, NAME, AGREECODE FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PW = SHA2(#{pw}, 256)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS_ACCESS (EMAIL, LAST_LOGIN_AT) VALUES (#{email}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET AUTOLOGIN_EMAIL = NULL , AUTOLOGIN_EXPIRED_AT = NULL WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL FROM USERS WHERE AUTOLOGIN_EMAIL = #{autologinEmail} AND AUTOLOGIN_EXPIRED_AT > NOW()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SLEEP_USERS ( EMAIL, PW, PHONENO, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, NAME, JOINED_AT, PW_MODIFIED_AT, SLEPT_AT, AGREECODE ) ( SELECT U.EMAIL, U.PW, U.PHONENO, U.POSTCODE, U.ROAD_ADDRESS, U.JIBUN_ADDRESS, U.DETAIL_ADDRESS, U.NAME, U.JOINED_AT, U.PW_MODIFIED_AT, NOW() AS SLEPT_AT, AGREECODE FROM USERS U LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS_ACCESS UA ON U.EMAIL = UA.EMAIL WHERE PERIOD_DIFF(EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()), EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM UA.LAST_LOGIN_AT)) >= 12 OR (PERIOD_DIFF(EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()), EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM U.JOINED_AT)) >= 12 AND UA.LAST_LOGIN_AT IS NULL) )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL IN ( SELECT EMAIL FROM ( SELECT U.EMAIL FROM USERS U LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS_ACCESS UA ON U.EMAIL = UA.EMAIL WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, UA.LAST_LOGIN_AT, NOW()) >= 12 OR (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, U.JOINED_AT, NOW()) >= 12 AND UA.LAST_LOGIN_AT IS NULL) ) AS TEMP )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (EMAIL, PW, PHONENO, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, NAME, JOINED_AT, AGREECODE, PW_MODIFIED_AT) SELECT EMAIL, PW, PHONENO, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, NAME, JOINED_AT, AGREECODE, PW_MODIFIED_AT FROM SLEEP_USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
